resources.string: 5. Beat the cream cheese and 50 grams (1/4 cup) of sugar on medium speed in a stand mixer or high speed with a hand mixer for 3 minutes. Decrease the speed to medium-low and gradually add in the cold cream. Add in 2 teaspoons of vanilla and beat until stiff peaks form.

350 G Bittersweet chocolate (60-70% cacao) 226 G unsalted butter 300 G granulated sugar 100 G light brown sugar 5 UNIT large eggs 1 TBLSP vanilla extract 140 G all purpose flour 40 G cocoa powder 1.5 TSP salt 350 G semisweet chocolate chips
